data.name: Bless Online: Dragon Knight Pack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains the Bless Online: Dragon Knight Pack
Items include the exclusive Dragon Knight costume and mount/pet skin, an automatic looting pet, Lumena, and more.

The Bless Online: Dragon Knight Pack can be downloaded once per account. As all components are character bound, please collect the DLC only with the character you wish to use it with.

The Bless Online: Dragon Knight Pack Includes the following benefits:

  • Exclusive Costume Skin (Dragon's Pledge Costume)
    Transform yourself into a Dragon Knight! This costume goes over character armor.

  • Exclusive Mount Skin (Grey Protector Bycon)
    Transform your mount into the menacing Grey Protector Bycon.

  • Exclusive Pet Skin (Dark Wing Puri)
    Transform your pet into the fearsome Dark Wing Puri.

  • Revenant Commander Nale (Auto-Loot Pet)
    Players may now hunt freely without interruption with the Revenant Commander Nale's auto loot function.

  • Lumena (7,200+700)
    Receive 7,900 Lumena to spend as you wish in-game. Don’t forget to visit the Lumena Shop!

  • Inventory Expansion Ticket (8 slot expansion x 4)
    Expand your inventory with the Inventory Expansion Ticket.

  • Extra Tactic Save Ticket (x 1)
    Create and save an additional tactic.

  • Companion Growth Potion (1 Hour) (x 10) (*Bonus Item)
    The Companion Growth Potion increases companion EXP gain by 20% for 1 hour.

  • Nutrition Refreshment for Mounts (1 Hour) (x 20) (*Bonus Item)
    The Nutrition Refreshment for mounts reduces a summoned mount’s stamina consumption by 20% for 1 hour.

  • Nutrition Refreshment for Pets (1 Hour) (x 20) (*Bonus Item)
    The Nutrition Refreshment for Pets reduces a summoned pet’s stamina consumption by 20% for 1 hour.


To apply purchased DLC products in-game, please follow the steps below.
  • Obtain purchased DLC from your Steam Inventory.
  • Log in to Bless and open your account inbox.
  • The items will be automatically sent to your character’s mailbox upon receipt.
    Once you accept the items in your mailbox, the item will automatically be added to the inventory of the character you used to accept the item.
    If it is an expiring item, the item’s remaining usage time will start counting down once you open the item’s packaging in your inventory.

Note:
- The items will be sent individually via the Account Inbox. Please make sure to select the correct character when redeeming each item.
- Please note that once the item is redeemed to a character’s inventory, it cannot be transferred to another character.
- Lumena items are bound to the character. Please redeem the items from your account inbox using the character you wish to use them on.
However, Lumena can be transferred between characters on the same account through the Lumena Transfer System.

data.short_description: This DLC contains the Bless Online: Dragon Knight Pack. Items include the exclusive Dragon Knight costume and mount/pet skin, an automatic looting pet, Lumena, and more.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64bit) *Bless Online cannot be played on 32bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4670 / AMD FX8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX760 / AMD Radeon HD7870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit) *Bless Online cannot be played on 32bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700 / AMD RYZEN 7 1700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1060 / AMD Radeon RX580
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
